mapper.select: SELECT CI.ITEMID AS "item.itemId", QUANTITY, I.LISTPRICE AS "item.listPrice", UNITCOST AS "item.unitCost", SUPPLIER AS "item.supplierId", I.PRODUCTID AS "item.product.productId", NAME AS "item.product.name", DESCN AS "item.product.description", CATEGORY AS "item.product.categoryId", STATUS AS "item.status", ATTR1 AS "item.attribute1", ATTR2 AS "item.attribute2", ATTR3 AS "item.attribute3", ATTR4 AS "item.attribute4", ATTR5 AS "item.attribute5", QTY AS "item.quantity", QUANTITY*I.LISTPRICE AS "total", QTY>QUANTITY AS "inStock" FROM CARTITEM CI, ITEM I, INVENTORY V, PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCTID = I.PRODUCTID AND I.ITEMID = V.ITEMID AND CI.ITEMID = I.ITEMID AND CI.USERNAME = #{value}
SELECT CARTID, USERNAME FROM CART WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
